resources.string: This is the activity where music is played. For the activity to be functional we need to use the mediaplayer class.

In this activity the songs in the user\'s device are categorized in albums. The albums will be presented in a recyclerView which will be populated by an ArrayList. The ArrayList will be populated by the MediaStore class

This activity contains all the artists that are found in the user\'s device. The artists list will be presented in a recyclerView which will be populated by an ArrayList. The ArrayList will be populated by the MediaStore class
In this activity all the songs in the user\'s device are presented in a recyclerView which will be populated by an ArrayList. The ArrayList will be populated by the MediaStore class
This activity will contain the user\'s playlists. The playlists will be presented in a recyclerView which will be populated by an ArrayList.
Red Hot Chilli Peppers - Give it away
Tricky - Hell is round the corner
